title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 93.1 - Borrowings for purposes other than repaying depositors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 93.1 - Borrowings for purposes other than repaying depositors

State Regulations
A savings bank may borrow money for purposes other than
repaying depositors, and pledge or hypothecate its assets as collateral for any
such loans, in an amount not exceeding 50 percent of its
assets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
93.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
